memberdef.name: SCHEDULE
memberdef.initializer: temp = schedule[(i - 3) & 0xF] ^ schedule[(i - 8) & 0xF] ^ schedule[(i - 14) & 0xF] ^ schedule[(i - 16) & 0xF]; \ schedule[i & 0xF] = ROTL32(temp, 1);

memberdef.name: ROUND0a
memberdef.initializer: LOADSCHEDULE(i) ROUNDTAIL(a, b, e, ((b & c) | (~b & d)) , i, 0x5A827999)

memberdef.name: ROUND0b
memberdef.initializer: SCHEDULE(i) ROUNDTAIL(a, b, e, ((b & c) | (~b & d)) , i, 0x5A827999)

memberdef.name: ROUND1
memberdef.initializer: SCHEDULE(i) ROUNDTAIL(a, b, e, (b ^ c ^ d) , i, 0x6ED9EBA1)

memberdef.name: ROUND2
memberdef.initializer: SCHEDULE(i) ROUNDTAIL(a, b, e, ((b & c) ^ (b & d) ^ (c & d)), i, 0x8F1BBCDC)

memberdef.name: ROUND3
memberdef.initializer: SCHEDULE(i) ROUNDTAIL(a, b, e, (b ^ c ^ d) , i, 0xCA62C1D6)

memberdef.name: ROUNDTAIL
memberdef.initializer: e = 0U + e + ROTL32(a, 5) + f + UINT32_C(k) + schedule[i & 0xF]; \ b = ROTL32(b, 30);
